org.datavec.api.transform.transform.nlp

Class TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.sequence.expansion.BaseSequenceExpansionTransform
      • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.nlp.TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ColumnOp, Transform

    public class TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform
extends BaseSequenceExpansionTransform
    Convert each text value in a sequence to a longer sequence of integer indices. For example, "zero one two" would be converted to [0, 1, 2]. Values in other columns will be duplicated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
